name: Let's Roll
description:
Let's Roll

This is a game where you become a pirate and overcome obstacles.
If you work hard, you will reach your goal.
It is a third-person platformer genre.
There is no set save point but you can save using skill.

Controls

Move - w,a,s,d
Jump - space
Attack - mouse left click
Time delay, Aim - mouse right click
Skill - E,R
Option - Esc
Crouch - Alt
Sprint - Shift

Tips

Don't Fall into the Sea
If the game is difficult, collect a lot of coins
If you press alt right before falling, you will roll forward
Do not try to climb on moving objects
The gun fires only when aiming
Please enjoy the game~
